CustomField.formula: "Monthly Price: " + TEXT(momentary_prime_monthly_price__c) + " "+ CASE(currency__c, "EUR", "€", "USD", "$", "PLN","PLN","CHF", "CHF", "GBP", "GBP","€") + BR() + "Yearly Price: " + TEXT(momentary_prime_monthly_price__c * 12) + " "+ CASE(currency__c, "EUR", "€", "USD", "$", "PLN","PLN","CHF", "CHF","GBP", "GBP", "€")
CustomField.label: Momentary Prime Price
